column4: linux is all about installing things. we love installing things. we don't just use the command "install music" or "install videocard". That would be too easy, too.. uninteresting. We linux users must always obscure the means by which we do things to seemingly elevate our level of understanding of the cosmos to such height that no mere mortal can understand us.
toba: did you mean.. sudo NovaFlash: lol? ;)
i will now cease to be funny.
